title: IDBI Bank sells distressed Rs 6151 cr portfolio to Omkara ARC
description: At inter-se bidding held on Saturday (August 3), Omkara ARC gave the highest offer of Rs 652 crore, outbidding government-promoted National Asset Reconstruction Company Ltd (NARCL). For IDBI Bank, the distressed portfolio sale equates to a recovery of 10.5%, which will be reflected in its second-quarter earnings.
